des:
Are you ready to explore your emotions? DJ Missy Motion is in the house to help kids celebrate their feelings. 

Join in DJ Missy’s Dance Party, Name That Mood guessing game, and Feelings Facts trivia and earn rewards. Then, power down in The Chill Zone.

MOOD MAGIC is a first-of-its-kind Alexa skill that teaches kids ages 5 to 8 about their emotions (and improves moods!) using original songs and feelings-focused activities. It’s part dance party, part mindful play, and a whole lot of fun. DJ Missy teaches self-awareness and the powerful idea that we can control our emotions—and even change and enjoy them—with music. 

Developed with a respected child psychologist, MOOD MAGIC also lets kids know it’s okay to have feelings and gives them the words and tools to better express themselves. Everyone gets [angry/afraid/etc.] sometimes! Whether kids need to “shake the sillies out” or go from “blue to happy,” DJ Missy will find a song or activity to match the emotion. 

** Make sure ‘Kid Skill Purchasing’ is enabled in your Alexa app to purchase the expanded experience with bonus songs, Feelings Facts, Chill Zone activities, and reward sounds. **

If you enjoyed MOOD MAGIC please leave us a review below!

Thanks for playing and dancing with us! —DJ Missy Motion.

Please Note: Disabling the skill will erase all previous player data on the game.
